articles.title: Malaysia warns of rising number of COVID-19 deaths, cases among children - CNA
articles.description: Malaysian health authorities have raised concerns about a growing number of coronavirus deaths and serious cases involving children, after a surge in overall infections forced the Southeast Asian nation into a strict lockdown.
